revisionDesc.change: removed spaces surrounding em-dashes and inserted space between initials
checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: I send you herewith a copy of a letter this day sent to P. Phillips, Esq., and, if you are the person who is Attorney of Record in case No. 286, John C. Harris, et al. appellant, vs. The United States on the docket of the present term of the Supreme Court, I desire to know whether there is any objection to a disposition of the case such as is indicated in the letter to Mr. Phillips.
